title: RT News - October 11, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: Hundreds of people in the central Russian city of Saratov demand that a murder suspect be put to death, after the body of a strangled 9-year-old girl is discovered. Vladimir Putin talks Turkey's offensive in Syria warning that ISIS may escape abroad in the result of the operation. A Ukrainian MP publishes documents he says reveal corruption involving Kiev and US Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden. A true legend Soviet cosmonaut Alexei Leonov, who conducted the first ever spacewalk, dies at the age of 85.
description: Hundreds of people in the central Russian city of Saratov demand that a murder suspect be put to death, after the body of a strangled 9-year-old girl is discovered
